message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics without an NDA, I assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm confident you'll find it even more valuable. To make this a mutually beneficial deal, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential upside you'll gain. Let me know your thoughts.
